intro: This document serves as a comprehensive Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) nomenclature guideline for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's Riparian Zones (RZ) product. It provides detailed descriptions of all LC/LU classes within riparian areas, including their geographic characteristics, applicable input datasets derived from various Earth observation missions, and pertinent interpretation methods. The guideline aims to ensure consistent and accurate mapping of riparian zones to support environmental monitoring and assessment activities.
